law.text: The appointment of a special administrator terminates upon the appointment of a personal representative or in the manner prescribed in Subtitle 3 of this title. The powers of a special administrator may be suspended or terminated in the same manner as prescribed in Subtitle 3 of this title for the suspension and termination of the powers, or the removal, of a personal representative.
